testcaseName: Zoster: MMR to Zoster interval 28 - 1 days
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from live virus vaccine
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is in early 50's and is administered a Zoster vaccine dose 28 -1 days after a MMR vaccine dose that the ZVL (Zostavax) vaccine dose is considered invalid. Zoster should be forecast in the future.
reasonForChange:
V3.4: Updated test case to reflect updated Zoster recommendations for Shingrix.
V2.0: New test case for version 2.0 which expanded scope into Adult recommendations
